queries.getAuditIndexList: SELECT distinct ROW_NUMBER()over(order by dam.OPERATION_TIME desc) as num, dam.AUDIT_MASTER_ID AS "auditMasterId", dam.FUNC_CODE AS "sysFuncCode", dsf.FUNC_DESC AS "sysFuncDesc", dam.HOST_NAME AS "hostName", dam.HOST_IP AS "hostIp", dam.OPERATOR_ID AS "sysOperatorId", dam.OPERATION_TIME AS "sysOperationTime", dam.REMARK AS "sysRemark" FROM IRD_AUDIT_MASTER dam WITH(NOLOCK) left join IRD_SYS_FUNC dsf WITH(NOLOCK) on dsf.FUNC_CODE = dam.FUNC_CODE WHERE 1 = 1 <#if funcCodes??> AND dam.FUNC_CODE in(:funcCodes) </#if> <#if sysFuncCode?? && sysFuncCode !!=''> AND dsf.FUNC_DESC =:sysFuncCode </#if> <#if sysOperatorId?? && sysOperatorId !!=''> AND dam.OPERATOR_ID =:sysOperatorId </#if> <#if hostName?? && hostName !!=''> AND dam.hostName =:hostName </#if> <#if sysOperationTimeStart??> AND dam.Operation_Time >= :sysOperationTimeStart </#if> <#if sysOperationTimeEnd??> AND dam.Operation_Time <= :sysOperationTimeEnd </#if>
queries.getAuditLogMaster: SELECT dam.AUDIT_MASTER_ID AS "id", dam.SERVICE_ID AS "serviceId", dam.PROCESS_ID AS "processId", dam.STAGE_ID AS "stageId", dam.FUNC_CODE AS "sysFuncCode", dsf.FUNC_DESC AS "sysFuncDesc", dam.HOST_NAME AS "hostName", dam.HOST_IP AS "hostIp", dam.OPERATOR_ID AS "sysOperatorId", dam.OPERATION_TIME AS "sysOperationTime", dam.REMARK AS "sysRemark", dss.SERVICE_CNAME AS "serviceCname", dss.SERVICE_PNAME AS "servicePname", dss.SERVICE_CODE AS "serviceCode", dsp.PROCESS_CODE AS "processCode", dsp.PROCESS_CNAME AS "processCname", dsp.PROCESS_PNAME AS "processPname" FROM IRD_AUDIT_MASTER dam WITH(NOLOCK) left join IRD_SYS_SERVICE dss WITH(NOLOCK) on dss.SERVICE_ID=dam.SERVICE_ID left join IRD_SYS_PROCESS dsp WITH(NOLOCK) on dsp.PROCESS_ID=dam.PROCESS_ID left join IRD_SYS_FUNC dsf WITH(NOLOCK) on dsf.FUNC_CODE = dam.FUNC_CODE WHERE 1=1 <#if funcCodes??> AND dam.FUNC_CODE in(:funcCodes) </#if> <#if sysFuncCode??> AND dam.FUNC_CODE =:sysFuncCode </#if> <#if sysOperatorId??> AND dam.OPERATOR_ID =:sysOperatorId </#if> <#if hostName??> AND dam.hostName =:hostName </#if> order by dam.OPERATION_TIME desc
queries.getAuditDetailByMasterId: SELECT dai.AUDIT_MASTER_ID as "auditMasterId", dai.AUDIT_INDEX_ID as "auditIndexId", dai.ACTION AS "action", dai.ROW_ID AS "rowId", dai.TABLE_NAME as "tableName", dad.COLUMN_NAME AS "columnName", dad.VALUE_BEFORE AS "valueBefore", dad.VALUE_AFTER AS "valueAfter" FROM IRD_AUDIT_DETAIL dad WITH(NOLOCK) left JOIN IRD_AUDIT_INDEX dai WITH(NOLOCK) on dai.AUDIT_INDEX_ID = dad.AUDIT_INDEX_ID WHERE dai.AUDIT_MASTER_ID = :auditMasterId
